title: openblas missing symbols
body:
subj on `openblas-0.2.16`

```
$ nm -g libopenblas.dylib | grep _dggsvd_
$ nm -g libopenblas.dylib | grep _sggsvd_
```

whereas on `homebrew` (openblas `0.2.15`) those are present:

```
$ nm -g libopenblas.dylib | grep _dggsvd_
0000000000e594bd T _LAPACKE_dggsvd_work
0000000000a1a470 T _dggsvd_
$ nm -g libopenblas.dylib | grep _sggsvd_
0000000000e9a114 T _LAPACKE_sggsvd_work
0000000000911540 T _sggsvd_
```

This ultimately leads to Trilinos build failure

```
/Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-x86_64/clang-7.0.2-apple/openmpi-1.10.2-37xieeupgsteaq6btru6wmhxfi44xqtn/bin/mpicxx   -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -dynamiclib -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names -compatibility_version 12.0.0 -current_version 12.6.1 -o libepetra.12.6.1.dylib -install_name /private/var/folders/5k/sqpp24tx3ylds4fgm13pfht00000gn/T/davydden/spack-stage/spack-stage-e3v2A0/trilinos-12.6.1-Source/spack-build/packages/epetra/src/libepetra.12.dylib
```
